body:
* build: add setuptools_scm (#215) @efiop
* fs: add acknowledge_abuse parameter (#214) @efiop
* docs: add pydrive2.fs (#213) @efiop

* fs: hide gdrive_* methods (#212) @efiop
* fs: simplify auth (#211) @efiop
* add copy method to drive.py (#188) @simone-viozzi

* auth: service: don't forget to load json configs (#208) @efiop
* gha: build and deploy docs (#207) @efiop
* auth: add client_json and client_json_dict (#206) @efiop
* settings: don't forget to specify struct for save_credentials_dict
* auth: validate dictionary backend settings (#205) @efiop
* auth: add dictionary storage (#204) @efiop

* auth: support passing settings dict to GoogleAuth (#203) @efiop
* auth: add client_creds_dict (#202) @efiop
* Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 (#199) @dependabot
* Bump actions/setup-python from 2 to 4 (#198) @dependabot
* Bump pre-commit/action from 2.0.0 to 3.0.0 (#201) @dependabot
* make checksum optional in GDriveFileSystem (#195) @simone-viozzi
* pydrive2: modernise to python 3.7+ (#168) @efiop

* Fix 163: make credentials save/load thread safe (#164) @shcheklein
* Update flake and black (#165) @shcheklein
* Fixed typo (#150) @arunpersaud
* Add info about query for files and wrap some lines (#147) @tmotyl
* Fix links in documentation (#146) @tmotyl
* Fix links to /pydrive2/ (#144) @tmotyl
* Add option to not launch the browser automatically via LocalWebserver (#140) @casperdcl
* fs.get_file: add callback support (#137) @skshetry

* docs theme (#135) @casperdcl
* add contributors (#134) @casperdcl
* setup: relax the fsspec requirement (#133) @isidentical

* find: fix detail=True for find() to return dicts (#128) @isidentical
* setup: don't forget funcy for [fsspec] (#126) @efiop
* gh: reduce the max-parallel to 3 (#125) @isidentical

* fs: implement a fsspec-based filesystem backend (#119) @isidentical
* gha: test: limit concurrency (#123) @efiop
* ci: add test/pre-commit actions (#121) @isidentical
* fixes 109: close settings file handler (#110) @shcheklein
* Fixes 103: fix and simplify fetch all metadata logic (#104) @shcheklein
* Auth: drop json credentials backend (#97) @isidentical

* A fix for access_type (#88) @leiyiz. This changes the default behavior on how refresh token is obtained if `get_refresh_token` is not set or set to `False`. If you experience any problems make sure that `get_refresh_token` is set to `True` or please, create a ticket, we'll try to take a look.
* Support JSON based service auth (#81) @isidentical

* Fix permissions call to work with team drives (#79) @shcheklein
* Update quickstart documentation (#69) @nmaynes
* Update release system (see 1.7.0 for release notes)

* Added example: upload and auto-convert file from command line using command line auth https://github.com/prasmussen/gdrive/issues/154
* Update default fields to fetch metadata https://github.com/googleworkspace/PyDrive/pull/96
* Update tox.ini (needs more fixes still)
* Update docs, clarify minot points related to V2 vs V3 docs https://github.com/googleworkspace/PyDrive/issues/99
* gdrive: remove empty file hack (#64) @efiop
* gdrive: download empty file (#48) @efiop
* bump google-api-python-client version to the latest (#56) @skshetry

* Added a custom chunksize to the GetContentFile method. (#50) @TA40
* add len(MediaIoReadable) (#40) @casperdcl

* add files.GetContentIOBuffer (#39) @casperdcl
* misc fixes (#35) @casperdcl

* fix download thread safety https://github.com/iterative/PyDrive2/commit/0b7bf78683f2fe400c6a967bcfc4f8e8d6660780 @shcheklein 
* test authentication (#33) @casperdcl

--------------

This release changes the way we throw exceptions in the GetContentFile. It doesn't throw `FileNotUploadedError` and `FileNotDownloadableError` errors anymore. Instead `ApiRequestError` is always raised and `GetField("reason")`:

```py
if (
    exc.error["code"] != 403
    or exc.GetField("reason") != "fileNotDownloadable"
)
```
* files: fix auth for GetContentFile (#32) @casperdcl
* file.GetContentFile: stream to disk, add callback (#30) @casperdcl
* don't set http.redirect_codes if the attr doesn't exist (#27) @mribeirodantas
* Fixes 308 HTTP code handling in resumable uploads (https://github.com/iterative/PyDrive2/pull/24) by @shcheklein
Extend ApiRequestError with HttpError details (#18) @MaxRis

* update google API lib, they solved the problem with the recent httplib2 (#17) @shcheklein
* Remove bad formatted yml (#16) @MaxRis
* Improve docs (#15) @MaxRis
